objects.text:
• 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced 77-Point Autofocus System
• Real-Time Viewfinder with 2.36M-Dot Resolution
• Built-in Wi-Fi for Instant Sharing

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro design with modern functionality
• High-performance 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II sensor
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 focus points
• Real-time viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3.0-inch LCD screen for creative angles
• Built-in Wi-Fi for instant photo sharing
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compatible with FUJINON X-mount lenses
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel
• Multiple film simulation modes for creative expression
• High-speed electronic shutter up to 1/32000 sec
• Durable metal construction with ergonomic grip
• Auto mode switch for beginners and manual controls for experts

banner_details:
This banner showcases a minimalist and professional design to promote a digital product. The main title (`heading`) is bold and prominent at the top in large white uppercase letters, immediately drawing attention. A contrasting subtitle (`subheading`) beneath it uses a vibrant orange to emphasize the product type. The product features (`description`) are listed below in a clean bullet-point format in light gray for clarity and readability. A high-resolution image (`product_image`) of the camera dominates the right side, creating visual focus. At the bottom left, the `price` is displayed in bold orange, accompanied by a vibrant `cta_background` button labeled with `cta`.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Warm Orange: `#F05A28`
- Light Gray: `#E5E5E5`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
- Dark Gray: `#2C2C2C`
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, utilizing a sleek and professional color palette dominated by matte black (#1C1C1C) and highlighted with metallic silver (#D8D8D8). Accents of white (#FFFFFF) for typography and control labels, and subtle red-orange (#FF5C33) near the focus ring, bring contrast without overpowering the visual balance. The lens glass reflects a gradient of cyan-green (#85F4FF) and pale yellow (#F9F871), adding a soft dynamic touch. The contrast between the matte textures and the metallic elements creates depth, making the camera appear refined and high-end. This palette is ideal for creating a modern, professional advertisement banner.
